title: 11th August 1919: The Weimar Republic officially established when Friedrich Ebert signs the new constitution into law
itunes:summary: It took the best of part of seven months for the delegates of the new German National Assembly to agree on the terms of the new Weimar constitution, which Ebert signed into law whilst on holiday in ...
